item.title: Adaptive Multi-Zone IoT Security Framework for Smart Factory Systems
item.description: A comprehensive smart factory network simulation using Cisco Packet Tracer, integrating advanced wireless technologies and IoT/IoE solutions for industrial environments designed to meet Industry 4.0 requirements.
